Package edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.touchemulation

Class Summary
GestureCursorActivity This class provides the simplest way to add a touch-free interface to an activity.
GestureCursorController Class GestureCursorController can be used to create the visual and functionality of a cursor that is controlled via gestures.
GestureScroller Class GestureScroller emulates the swipe-to-scroll touch-screen gesture with CameraGestureSensor's gestures.
 

Enum Summary
GestureCursorActivity.ClickSensorType Defines the three types of click sensors that can be used: Microphone, Accelerometer, and Camera.
